shows-desc: Are you looking for a spectacular aerial or acrobatic act for your event? An emotional duo, a beautiful ground based act or an exciting group show? Check out the different acts we offer! We are also willing to arrange personal Shows. A mix of Dance, Acrobatics, Fire and Theater makes every performance a unique experience!
warrior-concerto:
Warrior Concerto (Acrobatics Group Act)

This act has a length of 5 minutes. An empty space minimum 5mx5m is required.
wakeup:
Wake Up (Comedy Acrobatics Group Act)

This act has a length of 5 minutes. An empty space minimum 5mx5m is required.
proximity:
Proximity and Distance (Aerial Silks Duo)

This act has a length of 5 minutes and requires a minimum height of 7m.
freedom:
Freedom (Aerial Silks Solo)

This act has a length of 5 minutes and requires a minimum height of 5m.
offers:
• Acrobatic Duo/Group Shows
  • Aerial Silks Solo/Duo
  • Aerial Hoop Solo/Duo
  • Acrobatics/Aerial Mix Act
  • Comedy Acrobatic Group Act
  • Comedy Aerial Act
  • Fire Show
  • Fire Acrobatics Mix Show
  • Gala Acts
  • Midnight Specials
  • Street Art
